Description: Contact's email address used as the primary identifier in the database
Contact's first name
Contact's last name
Unique identifier for this contact in Zoho CRM
Unique identifier assigned when a contact creates a PriceLabs account. Null for prospects and most leads.
The primary email associated with the contact's PriceLabs account. May differ from the email field if the contact uses multiple emails.
Total number of managed units (listings/properties) added to the contact's PriceLabs account
Number of managed units actively synced with a PMS. A synced unit means PriceLabs is pushing pricing updates.
Number of managed units visible in the contact's listing view. Typically matches MU_count.
Current billing status of the contact's account
Contact's city (business location, not listing location)
Contact's state or province
Contact's country. Note: formatting is inconsistent across records.
Broad geographic region of the contact
Example Values: North America / Europe / APAC / LATAM / Middle East / Africa

Description: PriceLabs team member who owns this account relationship
Contact's phone number
Contact's company website URL
Contact's preferred language (ISO 639-1 code)
Example Values: en / es / fr / de / pt / ja / it

Description: Property Management System the contact uses or is associated with
How this contact originally entered the database
Example Values: Website / Webinar / Google Ads / Referral / Cold Outbound / Partner / Organic

Description: Category of properties the contact manages
Example Values: Vacation Rental / Short-term Rental / Hotel / Boutique Hotel / Serviced Apartment / Mixed

Description: Name of the contact's company or property management business
Contact's LinkedIn profile URL
Contact's Facebook profile or page URL
Contact's Instagram profile URL
Whether the contact has opted out of marketing emails
Referral code associated with this contact, if they came through a referral
Date the contact created a PriceLabs account. Null for prospects who haven't signed up.
Date the contact's free trial period ended. Only populated for trial users.
Countries where the contact has active listings (comma-separated). Only populated for trial/paying users.
Cities where the contact has active listings (comma-separated). Only populated for trial/paying users.
Current lifecycle stage of the contact in the database
Email domain extracted from the contact's email address
Concatenated location string combining city, state, and country
Whether the contact's email domain is on the blocked list (spam, competitors, etc.)
Whether the contact uses a generic email provider (Gmail, Yahoo, etc.) vs. a company domain
Contact's job title or role
Example Values: Property Manager / Revenue Manager / CEO / Owner

Description: Name of the last event or conference the contact attended
Email deliverability status of the contact's domain
Total number of emails sent to this contact via Mailchimp
Total number of outbound/cold emails sent to this contact
Total number of emails sent to this contact via Customer.io
Total emails sent across all platforms. Note: may not always equal the sum of individual platform counts.
Date the most recent email was sent to this contact
Name of the most recent email campaign sent to this contact
Platform used to send the most recent email
Date the first email was ever sent to this contact
Name of the first email campaign sent to this contact
Platform used to send the first email
Date of the last email sent to this contact before they created an account. Useful for attribution.
Campaign name of the last email sent before signup
Platform used for the last email sent before signup
Whether the contact has attended any PriceLabs webinar
Whether this email is the contact's primary email in the system. FALSE may indicate a secondary or outdated email.
